website_summaries.verdict: Pitcher-style frother set in a base with 3 convenient settings.
pros: Top safety features include stay-cool handle and dual auto shut-off mode
Frother is wipe to clean and the pitcher and lid are both dishwasher safe
cons: A more expensive option than most handheld models, and base has a moderate footprint

customer_reviews.title: See All The Five-Star Reviews?
customer_reviews.text: They will all disappear over time, because the machines simply do not last. Three Capresso machines broke down on me in just a few years I only use them once a day and follow all maintenance instructions. Why am I so dumb to buy three? Because they work great at first. You love them. And when they inevitably break down I tell myself I must have gotten a defective unit. I'm the one who's defective for buying this crap over and over.
customer_reviews.author: V. coppola

customer_reviews.title: I am quite disappointed & will in no way be replacing this Capresso ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th Capresso unit I have purchased. The 1st 2 purchased directly from Capresso. The 1st 2 lasted a little over a year before becoming faulty. They both stopped heating the milk which until then was piping hot & 1 of the units also stopped frothing fully. I purchased the 3rd unit through Amazon & it went faulty under 30 days so I returned & replaced with the same unit & this 4th unit that I am returning went faulty under 30 days, the same as the replacement. I am quite disappointed & will in no way be replacing this Capresso milk frother.
customer_reviews.author: humanmancalvin

customer_reviews.title: Are they using a cheaper motor now?
customer_reviews.text: I hate to rate this 3 stars. I love this frother. BUT. I've now had three of them. The first one lasted a year or maybe two, and that seemed acceptable. But the last two I've bought have only lasted a few months. They must be using a cheaper motor now. For the price, I think I'll have to find some other option this time. Sorry Capresso!
customer_reviews.author: prairie.princess

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this 8 months ago n loved it, however
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this 8 months ago n loved it, however...only giving 2 stares because coating in cup is chipping off. Have only used to froth milk or make cocoa, always washed by hand. It froths well but don’t want Teflon coating in my milk😞😡
customer_reviews.author: peggy d..

customer_reviews.title: Great frother. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I use this frother 2-3 times per day. easy to clean and does the best job of frothing. However, even changing the frothing discs when they wear down, I go through one of these every 9-12 months. Not sure if the jug wears out or the base but have to keep replacing them. Still better than the all-in-one frothers I've used. Have sent every singke one back because they either froth too little, too much and/or are hard to clean as the electrical connection is in the base so needs to be kept dry. With this one, the ju and base are separate so clean-up is a breeze
customer_reviews.author: M-Buc

customer_reviews.title: It’s great when it works but doesn’t work for very long.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this frother for a few years. I am currently on my third one. The first one started leaking, the second one the carafe started chipping and now the third one stopped working all together. When it works it works great, perfectly foaming the milk. But don’t expect to get more than a year of use if you plan on using it regularly. It’s hard to find a frother with a carafe that can be put in the dish washer so I kept buying it despite its flaws. But I won’t buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Redheads' Mom

customer_reviews.title: Milk frother
customer_reviews.text: This is an AMAZING little machine! It makes (hands down) the most OUTSTANDING hot chocolate I've ever made. It is easy cleanup too. I took mine into the office for a special Holiday Mingle and Jingle. I made over 60 hot chocolate's and they were such a hit! I told everyone about these little gizmos especially because the hot chocolate is drinkable on the first pour!You cannot get that with any other McDonald's, coffee shop, or any other place!! Follow the directions (pour milk in first) and then your cocoa. You will LOVE it! Other drinks like iced coffee, hot lattes, etc. are easy to make also. You will not regret buying this!
customer_reviews.author: Rese7

customer_reviews.title: Lousy customer service rep - but did the right thing!
customer_reviews.text: I've owned 6 Capresso / Jura espresso machines and 2 Capresso frothers. One lasted 3 years .. one lasted 7 months and when I called to get help all I got was lip service. Follow-up to original review. Customer Service emailed me to make sure everything was alright and assured me that if I had problems in the future I would be able to speak with a supervisor or Senior Rep. Meant a lot to me that they did the right thing.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hinson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Extremely quiet and makes perfect warm froth milk very quickly. Compact size takes very little room and also looks great. The cup is made from anodized aluminum which makes cleaning very easy. Handle is made of solid plastic and is secured to the metal cup with a heavy-duty rivet similar to cooking pots and pans handle. The cup is only warm to touch during operational and won't burn your fingers. There is a recessed space in the base to store/wrap power cord. Only minor negative is the power cord might be 12"-24" too short for some people.
customer_reviews.author: Gaikai

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: I bought this machine in late Dec. By Feb. it wasn't frothing anymore. Sent it back ($15 postage)and received another machine. This one has lasted around 2 weeks. It starts to rattle and that's about it. No froth. Heated milk. Not what I paid for. I can't afford to send this sucker back again, although the replacement is guaranteed for 30 days. Don't buy this. It's a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Tin Ear

customer_reviews.title: Stops working after a few days
customer_reviews.text: Machine worked great for about three days. Then, the frothing disc started to wobble and wouldn't froth even the lightest milk. I called the manufacturer and they said it is not designed for heavy cream(1/2 & 1/2). That is not mentioned any where in their advertising. Since they did not sell it to us directly, they would not pay for shipping on the return for another unit. I don't expect another unit would be any better because the spindle that the frother sits on is made of soft aluminum and wears down after a few days. Going to look for a better replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Rainey

customer_reviews.title: Giving up after three replacement units
customer_reviews.text: Unimpressed three times now after convincing company to send a replacement machine. Each time makes nice thick froth for few weeks of daily use then peters out to making a little foam, no matter what kind of milk or how fresh. New frothing disk sometimes improves things for a few days but then we go back to wimpy foam. We know someone who has same unit that is many years old that still froths just fine and that kept us hoping to get a replacement unit that would continue to work but no go. Company has given up on us and we are giving up on this as a frother.
customer_reviews.author: jn

customer_reviews.title: Look no farther for the perfect frother, been using but for 1 1/2 yrs now!
customer_reviews.text: Update: I have been using this since Aug 2018, almost 1 1/2 years and it still works great no problems! This is the best frother I have ever used. It froths perfectly plus you can have cold or hot froth. I have used it for coffee, tea, matcha and hot chocolate. It is very durable and there is only one piece that you take out to clean and that is held in magnetically. There is no reason to try any other frother. I've had so many and they just don't last very long. I've had this one for a couple of months and it is still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: CincyCheryl

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: The first couple of times I used this frother, I enjoyed nice froth in my coffee but I wondered why the blue light kept blinking even after the cycle was done. The 3rd time, the blue light just blinked - no spinning, no frothing. I tried unplugging, checked if the cup was warm (it was cold from the milk I had just poured into it), even waited until the next day to try again. Once I plugged it in, the blue light just blinked and pressing the button (any button) did nothing. I'm returning the frother - sad that it stopped working, but I'm not willing to gamble on another unit since so many reviewers mentioned the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Died fast. 3 months. This is my 4th one. yes I bought warranty still absurd
customer_reviews.text: Asurion 4 year warrantee didn't work. They told me to contact Capresso for manufacturer warranty. Capresso (Jura) made me ship base at my cost for return or repair. I only bought it in April and it died in July. It flashes the middle button but won't start spinning or heating. It seemed clever to buy the 4 year warranty for something you know dies fast (this is my 4th one) but still it's a feeble machine for daily use. Just a couple of froths per day and it won't hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D

customer_reviews.title: Takes My Morning Coffee To The Next Level
customer_reviews.text: I love frothed cream in my morning coffee. Makes it taste so much better! :) Until recently, I had been using a battery operated hand-held frother. Wow! This is so much better! It takes a little longer, but oh my what a difference! I've used everything from 1% milk to Half and Half cream and it works very well with both. So far, I haven't tried to make hot cocoa or other drinks, I've just used it for frothing my cream. Works amazingly well! No hesitation to recommend this product to others. BTW - we also bought the Capresso Burr Coffee Grinder a couple of years ago and are just as pleased with that product.
customer_reviews.author: Julia M

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 6 months and no way to return it.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Capresso. The first one lasted 8 years. Its replacement lasted only 6 months. My Capresso espresso machine also stopped working at about the same time. I'd like to return it but there doesn't seem to be that option for this product. What's going on? My advice: DON'T buy this product. Capresso's quality has deteriorated and I no longer trust the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen A. Newton

customer_reviews.title: Love the large capacity
customer_reviews.text: Love that it makes enough froth for 2 cups, I no longer have to make one latte at a time. I also tried it with a refrigerated espresso, poured it in with some milk and froth it together on hot setting, very convenient for those days when you're in a rush and all you have is coffee in the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Lala VS

customer_reviews.title: Great foam
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this frother. We use the froth setting most of the time. One thing to note is that when you are frothing almond milk, to get the best amount of foam, your milk needs to be on the fresher side. The longer it’s in the fridge the less foam it makes. I’m thinking it might have something to do with oxygen breaking down the enzymes in it. We get the half gallon cartons and now we have no problems getting the maximum amount of foam.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in the quality
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for 4 months, averaging 2-3 times per week. I clean it by hand immediately following, with a soft sponge. The coating is already wearing off the inside, I guess from the spinning frother disc. I was happy with the quality of the foamy hot milk it produced, but 4 months of limited and careful home use is not long enough. I wasn't trying to buy a disposable product.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer Beware

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for a long time! Made form cheap parts.
customer_reviews.text: It is a powerful mixer that is easy to clean BUT BEWARE you will not get much use out of it before it breaks. The motor magnet is just not strong enough to keep it spinning. Could be the best product on the market but with inferior parts it makes it another piece of junk that will hit the landfill! Shame on you as a manufacture!
customer_reviews.author: Truth

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product!
customer_reviews.text: this is my second Capresso. Both stopped frothing after only one year of gentle use. I called customer support and was told to change the spin elements. I did this and it did not work. I called back 10 days later and I was told I had no recourse. My order now says AND DID NOT SAY BEFORE MY SECOND CALL: Return window closed June 30. Nice move Capresso. I pointed out that I have many appliances that have lasted DECADES. Seriously ONE YEAR. Oh yes, and a friend called customer service after one year and was sent a NEW ONE. but not me.
customer_reviews.author: andea f lacombe

customer_reviews.title: Durability in Question
customer_reviews.text: I actually loved the frother, but durability is in question at this time. I ordered item on Oct 4th, the morning of Nov 4th it stopped frothing. I made an attempt to call them and after being on hold for over 15 minutes, I left a message. I didn't hear back so I emailed them. I received a call back and now they want me to send the frother back to them ($13.00) out of my pocket so they can determine if they can fix it or send me new one. NOT HAPPY!! This is one item I wish I had bought at a brick & mortar store so I could just exchange it for a working one.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley D

customer_reviews.title: Stopped frothing in less than 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: When it came it worked perfectly. With time there was less and less foam and in the less than 6 months there is none. The disck still spins but I guess not as fast as it used to and I’m not sure why. I’m not sure if the warranty covers it and if it does will another on quit in 6 mo?
customer_reviews.author: Martina A.

customer_reviews.title: Reliable & easy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product in 2013 and have used it several times per week since then. Today the motor died :-( and today I’m buying the exact same model again. It’s easy to use & dishwasher safe. If you are heating up & frothing cold milk, it will take several minutes to do its thing. If I’m in a rush, I microwave it first & then froth it. This is the first milk frothier I’ve owned, so I don’t know if it is faster or slower than other models/brands. Overall very pleased, I recommend this product to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Foam
customer_reviews.text: I am on my third one of these, the first one lasting the longest, second one not, but now on the third and the reason I keep sticking with Capresso is because it makes awesome foam! It is small, easy to use and I really, really like it. When the first AND second one quit, I actually called Capresso and they were very willing to work with me and give me a bid discount on a replacement. So I highly recommend this particular unit!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Meacham

customer_reviews.title: BREAKS DOWN IN ABOUT A YEAR..
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one in 3 years. They fail . The frother stops spinning. Starts out good then this machine just breaks down. I recommended this to my sister and she had the same issue.. Fool me once...
customer_reviews.author: modigliani

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: The first shipment was defective and did not turn on at all. Okay, it happens. Returned the frother for a replacement. Worked for one day and now is acting all wiggy. The only way to describe it is that it randomly turns on when not in use if the frother cup is in the holder. I woke up to the empty frother spinning and heating up randomly throughout the night. On - Off - On - Off - etc. Do not recommend this frother.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Sadly it has lasted only 3 month's
customer_reviews.text: This made fantastic frothed milk, and was very easy to use. Sad it just stopped working after only using about 5 times a week for only 3 month's. It started to fail about a week ago and would stop frothing before the cycle was finished and the milk was hot. Still under warranty so hoping they will fix it?
customer_reviews.author: Susan M.

customer_reviews.title: I have one I had for at least 4 years and it worked great then stopped foaming
customer_reviews.text: So this must have a defect! I have one I had for at least 4 years and it worked great then stopped foaming. So I ordered a new one and this one does not foam at all :( I tried both blades and watched a youtube video even though I've used my old one for several years. It must be defected! Very dissapointed...I love my morning coffee with lots of foam and it's been a week :( not sure if I should get another one....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fanatastic frother, lasted 6 years
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, bought one six years ago. It works extremely well. It just broke because the attachment point of the handle rusted internally and the handle shifted and cracked off. I did put it in the dishwasher frequently, not sure if that contributed to a shortened life. Over the course of use, some minor chipping in metal coating. I do plan on replacing with the same product, despite the 6-year lifespan because it functioned so well.
customer_reviews.author: Nhlisa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing frother. I use it every day and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing frother. I use it every day and it is easy to clean and use. I recommend it to people all the time. A must have if you like cappuccinos or lattes! I used to think this was amazing but now I’m on number three because they all keep dying. The second one worked for only two cups and Now the third is dead too. When it did work, it was great
customer_reviews.author: Ny8181

customer_reviews.title: Quit after one year one month....
customer_reviews.text: Up date: After a year and one month my new frother crapped out. Of course the warranty is for one year. Unlike my first Capresso, which ran well for several years, this one didn't last. When it worked it made great froth but I was expecting more than a year's service from a $60 dollar frother. The quality of the Capresso froth pro has really declined over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald L Andersch

customer_reviews.title: Love it BUT....
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine only now a year later the coating is coming off. This is worrisome since I don't know if that Teflon coating is poisonous.... Contacted the manufacturer and received a new cup, however, even after "babying" the item (washing with only a soft cloth and using rubber spoon) the coating on the rim is off again. Buying a glass cup or stainless steal might be a better option.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Zega

customer_reviews.title: Best Milk Frother Made
customer_reviews.text: We went thru 4 different kind of milk frothers in the last 2 years, from Naspresso, to Starbuck, to two CBTL (Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf), to Aroma before purchased this one from Capresso. This one is by far the best we have ever experienced with ease of use, ease of cleaning, and operate. medium price compare to Naspresso. I also purchased 3 year appliance warranty from Amazon just in case. 4/27/2017, the last one last for 2.5 years with a 3 years protection plan, so we got full price refunded and we just purchased another one. still again the best we have experience, very happy about it, hope they sell the extra frother unit.
customer_reviews.author: Beau

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy!! Best is when I now get Fancy Coffee Drinks delivered to me in BED within minutes of waking  :)
customer_reviews.text: I am loving my cold fancy coffee drinks from home this summer!! I bought on a recommendation of a friend and it was the best gift I have given myself. I make espresso in a french press pot for hot drinks, or cool for later for cold drinks. Even better is when you can find a highly concentrated cold press coffee concentrate when making cold ones. You just add mild and push a button a snowflake for cold milk or a heat wave for hot milk. The froth stays longer than at the fancy coffee shops. The price of the machine will pay for itself in 1-2 months!! Easier than I thought. Quick Clean Up!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: works great and then customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I like the functionality, the low setting produces perfect cappuccino froth, the separate carafe is great also, but the motor stop working after two months. I called customer service and they were very expedited, after a few questions they sent a new machine the same day - I hope the new one works longer this time, I really like this one.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Menendez

customer_reviews.title: I love the foam that this Capresso Milk Frother makes
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered a different brand and was not pleased with the froth. I ordered this one and I love it! The froth is creamy and rich and adds such a nice touch to my morning coffee. It also warms the milk to a nice temperature so my coffee stays hot. This is very easy to clean. It has two parts and I love that it has a handle. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Susie S

customer_reviews.title: product life = 400-450 uses then it will die
customer_reviews.text: my 2nd one just died. exactly as my 1st did. after 400-450 uses it will breakdown. It gets 2 stars not 1 because when it does work when it does work it does a good job. But, IT IS NOT A PRODUCT DESIGNED OR BUILT TO LAST. after my 1st one broke I gave them the benefit of the doubt and bought another. same thing failed. Advice: buy something else
customer_reviews.author: colin

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT LAST!!! VERY DISAPPOINTED CAPRESSO
customer_reviews.text: I have owned three of these. I love ease of use and easy clean, but motor doesnt last . First model lasted 2.5 years then disk would no ,onger spin. I purchased a replacement that was very loud and did not have sufficient spinni ng power to froth. Capresso sent a replacement that lasted 11 months before disk started loding spinning power and now is completely dead. It is so frustrating because this is one of my favorite appliances, but I eont recommend and it is time for me to try another vendor's product. Sooo disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Best brother on the market, but product quality is bad.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best milk frother on the market (I've tried lots of them) except it fails after about a year. What I like about it is it froths much more milk than other models, plus it keeps frothed milk warm. You can use it to make a large cup of hot chocolate which no other brother can do. The big fail is product quality. I've owned three of these and they all failed within a year or so of daily use. That's unacceptable. Buy it for occasional use and I suppose it'll be fine. Otherwise, you'll have to make do with a frother that does less and makes less froth.
customer_reviews.author: MA Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Makes coffee worth drinking!
customer_reviews.text: I love this frother! In the mornings, it makes the most consistently small bubbled froth, so smooth and thick. In the evenings, I use it to heat up 1/2 cup of milk with chocolate powder, cinnamon, cayenne pepper, and one tablespoon each hazelnut syrup and tawny port. Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: BAS

customer_reviews.title: Best Milk Frother Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Capresso Milk Frother and love it even more than the first. The milk gets beautifully frothed and just the right temperature for my morning cappuccino. This is very easy to use and to clean. The cup is nonstick which is new and improved from the older style. This Milk Frother is so much better than what's on my espresso machine. This is a Must Have!
customer_reviews.author: Christine in CT

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful warm foamy milk for my coffee. Blends great and lots and lots of foam. Very easy to clean as it has a non stick coating. Didn't like the stuck on table on top of the see through lid. Took me 2 days of soaking and scraping to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Harmer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working in 16 months
customer_reviews.text: I really like the way this unit worked. It was very easy to use and easy to clean though it does take quite a long time to finish frothing. It has now stopped working - like similar reviews, it seems to be the magnet that's no longer functioning. I've used this at least once every day for 16 months so I wouldn't call my use 'minimal' but this is not a cheap appliance and I don't think it's reasonable to expect it break down so soon. I won't buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Foreman

customer_reviews.title: broken motor turned out to be easily replaceable part
customer_reviews.text: great idea. We loved it but it breaks down quickly. The handle snapped off & the motor died. I ordered a 2nd one from Amazon. Now the motor on my 2nd is dying too. We use if a few times a week. For this price I feel like it should be lasting longer. UPDATE: Turns out it was a problem with the small round hooked metal frothier rather than with the motor! These ship with an extra round little frothier on the bottom of the base of the unit. I put in the new one and the motor purred like it was brand new! Updating to 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gray

customer_reviews.title: nifty and quiet
customer_reviews.text: Does an excellent job in a short time. The volume limit lines are well defined and must be adhered to. It make a lovely froth, bought one for my daughter and she also loves it
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Stops working!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the first one I bought, it worked for years. The 2 new replacements both quit spinning. I bought my latest one in Jan. 201......UGH!!! I'm guessing they changed something in there design. I don't recommend this at all!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon D.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this Machine!
customer_reviews.text: This milk frother/heating machine is fantastic! I use it with unsweetened soy milk and it produces a very thick froth. Using the higher heating option (middle button) melts 72% Dark Chocolate for a healthy hot chocolate drink. (Heat and froth your milk before throwing in the chunk of chocolate or it will catch in the frothing wheel.) I was initially hesitant to purchase this item because it does not use the traditional steamed - milk method of frothing, but I now think this does a much better job of producing a thick froth. Because the magnetic frothing wheel is easily removed (it pulls right off), cleaning the pitcher is a snap. I highly recommend this machine!
customer_reviews.author: InMotion

customer_reviews.title: Great for quick milk frothing
customer_reviews.text: Good product, makes nice froth and I don’t have to use frothed on my coffee maker that takes time to clean. The froth depends on the type of milk you buy. I notice whole organic milk makes the best froth for coffee. Some whole milks cannot produce the adequate froth and no matter how long you mix it and heat it, it’s not going to work, so if that happens to you, try a different brand milk. This frothed is easy to use, and clean, heats up milk quickly, I love it and use it every day
customer_reviews.author: Maggie D

customer_reviews.title: Frother works really nicely
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest way to warm and froth milk I have ever seen on the market. Just pour milk in, press the desired button, watch it froth until it automatically stops, enjoy your coffee and then clean it up with ease. Only recommendation is to mix milk with half and half. Milk alone, especially low fat, just doesn’t produce a good froth! I have read other reviews of this product which say it doesn’t last. Since the cost is relatively low, I can accept replacing it.
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: Fair warning
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product in 2012 and it worked about 7 times before the agitator disc stopped moving. I babied the machine - hand washing it right away and cleaning the disc each time - rotating with backup disc. No debris or problem with the screw post at the base of the unit. Now it only heats milk and does that sufficiently only when you repeatedly push the "hottest" setting. Would not recommend at all. I should've returned this this right away - that was my error. I'm writing review because I just unearthed the dang thing again and was PO'ed all over again :)
customer_reviews.author: swva

customer_reviews.title: Typical Made You Know Where Junk
customer_reviews.text: Just like everyone else, they just keep breaking. No apparent reason. Just low quality, slapped together with no quality control. A poor investment when you know the quality is this bad AND it has ELECTRICITY and a HEATER in it and then we add a liquid to the mix! A recipe for disaster. This is a new twist thought - typical crappy offshore quality AND a high price. After a hundred bucks I am tossing unit #2 in the trash and looking for something else. Why does Amazon continue to stock products like this? The manufacturer will not get the message. I guess I share the blame for supporting Amazon. Maybe that is the part that needs rethinking...
customer_reviews.author: David Bailey

customer_reviews.title: I loved it until it caught fire for no apparent reason
customer_reviews.text: I love this, but I’ve gone through two of them in the last 6 years approximately. The first one just stopped working after a few years. My most recent one actually went out in flames after 2 years of intermittent use. I was making hot chocolate and the machine suddenly started smoking. I unplugged it and placed it in the metal sink to cool down, and then from there it went into the trash. My kitchen had an acrid burning smell for weeks. I’d love to get another but I don’t want to start an electrical fire. Maybe I’ll have better luck with the (much more expensive) Breville version? Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: tr86543

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction and malfunctions out if box
customer_reviews.text: Beware of buying this milk frother! The first one I received had a malfunctioning motor. It barely frothed the milk and also made an obnoxious squealing noise. They replaced it with one that the handle is not properly attached to the pitcher, the handle wiggles back and forth instead of being tightly attached. I'm not even sure I want to try for a third after how poorly constructed the first two were. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Angel Marie

customer_reviews.title: It was amazing... then it stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: I never knew that hot foam on my tea lattes at home would be life changing. But they were. And I found myself waking up earlier each day to be able to calmly enjoy my latte before work instead of opting for an expensive one at the drive-through coffee shop. But then it stopped working. No spinning. Just heat. I'm pretty sure I cried that morning, then cursed the fact that I hadn't heeded the warnings friends had for me here. I still have it in the kitchen. I'm not sure why though. Perhaps I'm hoping that I can will it back to working again. But alas, nothing so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Michelle

customer_reviews.title: this is my favorite. Pros
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many milk frothers over the years, this is my favorite. Pros: You can wash the whole pitcher and lid in the dishwasher, it's big so you can make enough for 2-3 people's coffee at one time, milk gets good and hot and lots of foam (using 2%). Cons: base gets very hot (as does the pitcher). Don't hit the button twice or the milk will overflow (learned that the hard way), and it's hard to get the base clean if milk burns on it and it does take 3-4min to heat the milk so patience is a virtue!
customer_reviews.author: Happywander

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time.
customer_reviews.text: It worked great but this is the second one and two years. It’s broken again. I’ll buy another frother but not this brand. Doesn’t last.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Creates the best microfoam!
customer_reviews.text: Love that there are two heat settings. I like my lattes a little cooler than my husband does, so I really appreciate that setting. Comes with two foaming disks and one heating disk for when you want a no-foam latte for your friend Gail. That's not even a latte then is it Gail? Hmmm? FINE!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Kantor

customer_reviews.title: junk
customer_reviews.text: I purchase 2 of these they both broke within a year. yeah they will replace them after you pay for shipping and a lot of hassle. Don't waste time or money. UPDATE; The shipping cost was 15.00 for both machines in one box insured for 100.00 lest than they cost together. The customer service was very good. They help me arrange to ship both machines back. I received a letter that both machines were repaired no charge. I have not receive them yet. they shipped them parcel post I guess. I will update on the quality of the repaired machines. Maybe i will update the stars not on initial quality. but maybe on the quality of the repair.
customer_reviews.author: LIKE GOOD PRODUCTS

customer_reviews.title: 2 YR LIFE-and more
customer_reviews.text: Purchased after returning from Spain drinking cappuccino every day. Used once daily for almost 2 years. Did an excellent job for almost all that time, then died. Still heated milk, but no froth. Hand washed, but can go in the dishwasher. Update I used a tiny bit of liquid wrench on the bottom, middle of the cup and it is working again! I have very hard water and evidently, something on the bottom should move. Still working!
customer_reviews.author: Babs3456

customer_reviews.title: This a chine makes perfect froth out of zero fat milk to half and ...
customer_reviews.text: This a chine makes perfect froth out of zero fat milk to half and half! The foam can be easily scooped out and the container cleans very easily with the "teflin" type finish. All I have to do is set the pitcher in the stand, press the button and in about 90 seconds I have extremely creamy, frothy milk for my coffee.The only problem I could see is breaking the flimsy plastic piece that creates the foam. It does come out easily and could fall down the garbage disposal. I love this frother!
customer_reviews.author: Siesta

customer_reviews.title: Worked 90 times = 52 cents per use before 100% failure!
customer_reviews.text: We were fastidious in our care of this 'frothPro' as per the manufacturers recommendations; never left the jug on the base; always unplugged the base in-between uses; always ensured the correct liquid levels were observed. Despite this, the unit just gave up after a maximum of ninety uses; it simply stopped frothing. A noteworthy observation is that, had I not stayed with the unit, the base seems to overheat now, so who knows what horrors could await one of the unit is left unattended. Avoid buying this, and choose a better brand!
customer_reviews.author: Andy S

customer_reviews.title: So far we love this frother
customer_reviews.text: So far we love this frother. We have only used the Nespresso frother in the past and we just tried this brand since we like our Capresso water kettle. The non stick surface seems to be a nice quality. We'll shall find out in a couple of moths. It has cold frother that works and has 2 hot temperature frothers. I tried to make hot chocolait using a granular coco that I got from Mindy's hot chocolait in Chicago and it came out perfect with no unmelted coco. I can not give a five star due to the non stick surface and I am still assessing it's performance.
customer_reviews.author: JNicholas

customer_reviews.title: works for two years
customer_reviews.text: I lost the frothing disk in the sink a couple of times while washing the unit, so pay attention when washing the unit. It heats up quickly and the froth disk worked until 2 yrs of owning. The heat disk still works but doesn't froth anymore.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Better than hand made!
customer_reviews.text: This milk frother is a wonderful machine. We use it about 5 times each week. It makes really great tasting hot chocolate. I put milk in the frother and with it running empty a packet of hot chocolate mix in it. Froths and so yummy!
customer_reviews.author: Ray White

customer_reviews.title: Nice easy to use hot cocoa maker
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much only use this for making hot chocolate but it works very well for that. Have had it for several years now and not had any issues. Pretty easy to clean and being able to put it in the dishwasher is fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Whisker Magic.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Capresso in five years, but I use mine several times a day. They work well, but the machines don’t have great longevity.
customer_reviews.author: TODMTNS

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for 2 years now and it is used everyday in the winter months for lattes. As long as you don't overfill it, it will last. I overfilled it once and milk went all over and down on the hot plate and I was so nervous it was going to break. I cleaned it meticulously and it was fine. Skim milk makes superior foamy foam, 2% is not as airy but not bad. Not sure about 1% or whole. Soy does not make any foam. This works better than my mothers $2000 espresso machine frothing attachment.
customer_reviews.author: TheMrs.R

customer_reviews.title: and we really like them - except they don't last
customer_reviews.text: We have had at least 4 of these frothers, and we really like them - except they don't last. The problem is that after a year the spinner/cup don't spin enough to froth. If you buy the warranty as we did, then you can return the frother and get a new one - so, with the warranty, you get another new frother. We love the way it functions and that it's dishwasher safe (remember to remove the spinner). We only wish they would make replacement cups because they all fail in about a year. still, we have enjoyed latte's and hot chocolate every day.
customer_reviews.author: Merry

customer_reviews.title: Does not last. Beware. Good for about a year
customer_reviews.text: Works fantastically to start then eventually it starts to die. Heat goes then blending next. A pity because when new - it's the best.
customer_reviews.author: Tridacna

customer_reviews.title: No Noise Latte!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this machine for its perfect heating and foaming ability. It’s consistent with each use to make perfect latte ever morning. The best part is not having to listen to the sound of steaming your milk which can be very loud. It give a perfect foam without the noise for those who love their lattes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great While It Lasted
customer_reviews.text: This frother worked great for about five months, but last week it just stopped warming the milk. I'm really bummed. Before I got the frother I would get a latte at Starbucks every day. Then I went on maternity leave and used this frother every day. I loved it! It used to warm and froth nicely. It would take a solid minute or two! Another plus is that it's easy to clean. I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC!  THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: This is the best and easiest frother I've ever used. Makes the thickest froth in about 1-2 minutes and works great with fat free milk. Get my frother going, then turn my Kuerig on and brew my coffee--by the time coffee's ready my milk is frothed and ready to add to the coffee. Easy to use, easy to clean and works fabulously. Didn't find it too difficult to remove the frothing disk--it's a lot sturdier than it looks but you only need to remove it if you want to heat without frothing. Try adding a little sugar and even some vanilla to your milk before frothing--you'll have your own whipped topping for your coffee or hot chocolate--it's that good!
customer_reviews.author: Reading Lady

customer_reviews.title: Fire hazars
customer_reviews.text: This is a very dangerous machine. You cant leave it plugged in. It turns on and starts grinding without even touching it. I have come home multiple times to find it in On with no liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Coloradogirl1408

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: There is an apparent lifespan on this product. However it is the easiest /best one I have ever had. It is the easiest to clean and can even be used in a dishwasher the only one I have found that does. You can put the milk in and push the button and walk away do what you need and come back. Creates decent foam/froth. Better than other models I have used. It is not technically as good as steam froth no machine like these could be. IT does however heat up and froth. Wish the price was a bit lower.
customer_reviews.author: SEA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and Design
customer_reviews.text: Did quite a bit of research on the reviews and was going to get another, but I think this was the better choice for two reasons: (1) the pitcher is completely dishwasher and hand-washing safe; many of the others are not. (2) as you can see, it has a large base which is because of the large heating plate. The froth comes out as hot as anyone can expect for froth. The results so far have been perfect. To make froth for two cups takes about 3+ minutes. I would say it is worth the price. Only have been using it tho for one week.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory G. Koss

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart at six months
customer_reviews.text: I used to order a super-sized misto or cafe au lait at the local barista shop. Now I save $1 per day by ordering the big cup full of black coffee, and diy the frothy milk. Does the job in about 2 minutes. Small countertop footprint, easy to clean. Very happy...for the first six months... Exactly six months later--The handle broke off the pitcher. The pitcher was only hand-washed and immediately hand dried with a soft towel. Never once put into a dishwasher. Sent an email w/ photo to Capresso. They immediately replaced the defective pitcher. The new pitcher does not appear to be an improved model.
customer_reviews.author: B. P.

customer_reviews.title: ... myself but I am told that it produces the best foam ever
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift so I have not used it myself but I am told that it produces the best foam ever. The recipient had another more expensive product which quit after a short period of time and failed to perform adequately. Consequently, Capresso gets 5 stars because they are deserved. Be mindful that we're dealing with a short testing time but so far it has performed superbly.
customer_reviews.author: Duffy

customer_reviews.title: stopped working within 9 months of purchase
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the frother 12/2014 and it already stopped working. It didn't even make it a full year. The frother itself won't spin and the heating mechanism isn't working properly. We are pretty careful with our kitchen equipment too so this is not the result of unusual use. I am going to contact the company for a refund or replacement. I'm especially disappointed because our last frother from another company lasted several years. It's hard to give a compliment to the product because it hasn't lasted very long but before it stopped working we did enjoy the product.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Marchesi

customer_reviews.title: Good while it works
customer_reviews.text: Like some others have posted, this thing works great with great foam until it stops working. I got about four uses out of this frother until it stopped working. Even from a cold start (straight out of the cabinet), it blinks as if it is overheating and it won't start. I can sometimes hold down the button to get it to work, but then it will only spin for 5-10 seconds before stopping. I just returned it to Amazon for a refund. Capresso needs to work on their quality based on the reviews here.
customer_reviews.author: J. Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Best ever used.
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this and I never used it until I bought a Nespresso expresso maker. I pour just enough milk into this to cover the spinner and within a minute I have the perfect amount of perfectly frothed milk. Super easy to clean and reuse especially compared to the expensive milk frothers I've had in the past on $500 plus machines. We've used this one for quite awhile now almost everyday and have had no problems with functionality. I would buy it again even if it didn't last.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the best things I've ever bought for myself.
customer_reviews.text: In the past I have used espresso machines with frothers which worked great but were horrible to clean. I searched amazon and found this Capresso frothPro and ordered it on a whim. From the day it arrived it has been used every day and usually multiple times a day, my entire family loves it! Every morning I use it to make a vanilla latte or other 'specialty' coffee drink. Cleaning it is a breeze, 2 out of the 3 pieces go right in the diswasher. Initially I wasn't thrilled with the price, but since we've had this frother our trips to Starbucks have gone down by 80%. It paid for itself within 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my coffee!
customer_reviews.text: It works great! I use it everyday since I purchased and it makes great foam. I notice though if I want to make it for 2, it makes more foam if I divide the milk. It foams cold milk as well. You should wash the foaming disc with care so you don’t damage it. I recommend it! I have seen it the 1st time at my friend’s house in Cologne and fell in love. Came home and got my own!
customer_reviews.author: Guisela Rischard

customer_reviews.title: Super Frother
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to complement my Keurig and it is awesome! I love that it has 3 temperature options, that it gives you the option of warm milk without the foam, and that you can walk away from it while it's doing its thing. I just pour milk in, turn it on, start the Keurig, and walk away for a couple of minutes and bam! It's so easy to use and easy to clean. It's like having an espresso machine without having to deal with the milk steamer, which I've never had much luck with no matter how diligent I was trying to maintain them. The steamer always got clogged or stopped working. Anyway, I absolutely love this frother!
customer_reviews.author: Kai Ayana

customer_reviews.title: Y
customer_reviews.text: El froth pro calienta muy bien pero no hace espuma podrian decirme que tendra malo. English The froth Pro heat perfect but does not make foam need to know why? --------------------------------------------------- Lo ordene porque una amiga tienen uno y hace bastante espuma English I order it because my cousin have one and does make alot of foam. Need a reply Asap
customer_reviews.author: LEONARDA CERDA

customer_reviews.title: It was great until it stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: We loved our frother for slightly more than six months. Then it stopped frothing. Since we are outside the warrantee period, we will have to buy a new one. We normally don’t buy a protection plan because we assume that high quality appliances should last awhile. Next time we will grudgingly purchase the insurance. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Saves money and makes for a better cup of coffee!
customer_reviews.text: Best thing since sliced bread! I live way up in the mountains of Northern California, and a long way from fresh food. I've been using creamer for my coffee and throwing away milk that spoils way before it's pull date, even in a very good refrigerator. With the Capresso, I'm now not having to buy and store creamer, nor losing milk. It's a win/win situation for me. This machine will pay for itself in less than a year!
customer_reviews.author: C. Doughty

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite frother of the 4 or 5 we've tried
customer_reviews.text: This frother isn't as elegant looking as some, but it does a flawless job of making a foamy froth. It's a little the consistency of whip cream with low fat milk--a little different from retail coffee houses--but thick and wonderful. The frother also has two heat settings and gets the foam hotter than some brands. Wand frothers just don't work. We've tried three of those. The other glitzy pitcher model we had before made great froth but didn't get it as hot as this does. We're still looking for one that gets a bit hotter, but this is a big improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Meli-B

customer_reviews.title: Great in the beginning, but the motor slows way down.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product less than a year ago. It started out as an amazing product. It would froth milk very effeciently and effectively. I was very pleased. However, over time the motor has started to slow down and the milk isn't frothing like it did initially. I have to push the froth button 3 times instead of once. I can sense that the motor is ready to die. I am aleady researching to get a new machine. If you plan on using this machine daily I would get a machine that has more longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Mariellen

customer_reviews.title: Slow heating
customer_reviews.text: I am not really impressed with this product as it’s really slow in heating up the milk. I still have to microwave my coffee after frothing it. There’s no automated setting or timer to stop the frothing. It’s a very simple machine with 3 buttons and they all do the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Uttara

customer_reviews.title: Great for it's job
customer_reviews.text: Just use this to make my latte in the morning. Fantastic frother which only takes about 3 minutes to complete. Keeping it clean can take a little extra effort but I wouldn't say I've tried too hard. It usually has a little residue on it after it's dried from my cleaning it in the morning. Can't go wrong here!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Voss

customer_reviews.title: great froth!
customer_reviews.text: This frother is great! After burning up several good pans on the stove trying to warm up milk for coffee latte, I was thrilled to find this Capresso frother! It heats up the milk quickly and efficiently with no burning! Easy to clean. Love this appliance!
customer_reviews.author: RSC

customer_reviews.title: Frothy Delight
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I purchased the frother. Wonderful frothy concoction made on my very first try (using skim milk no less). Well worth the price. Cleans up in a flash and doesn't take up any room on my coffee section of my counter. Now if I could only find an inexpensive and good espresso maker (sigh). Have a very expensive model that has never worked well and the foamer on it was a joke. Of course it is now sitting on a garage shelf gathering dust. But at least now I am enjoying all my teas with great hot foamed skim milk. Pure delight and so soothing to my soul.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must-Have for coffee or chocolate drinkers
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous product. Make late's or cappuccinos, chocolate milk or hot chocolate for the kids. Heats at 2 levels or no heat, froths or simply mixes. Turns off by itself when finished. Very sturdy. We use this daily and it's wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: NotSmall

customer_reviews.title: this thing rocks
customer_reviews.text: stand down starbucks. this frother is a one- 2 person and done. so don't think you are going make capp's for a room of people. It works awesome. But only for 2.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Murray

customer_reviews.title: Hands Down the BEST Frother
customer_reviews.text: I am a barista and I'm not a real big fan of automatic frother's. However, when my home machine is in the shop for repairs I use the Capresso PRO. It's a great machine for the money. I've exchanged my Nespresso frother for this one and it's hands down for making creamy latte's and frothy cappuccino's. Holds more milk and you can repeat the cycle immediately to increase milk temperature. You can't do that with a Nespresso. Don't hesitate to push the "add to cart" button when considering this product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Waldrip

customer_reviews.title: Always works for me after 3 months of use
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavier, sturdy-feeling unit. It comes with an extra froth disk (2 total) and a heating disk for non-frothing heat. Its great that you can froth hot, warm, or cold as you desire. I have been using it every day for three months without a hitch, and its good to know that when the shaft in the pot wears out all I have to do is to buy an inexpensive pot rather than the whole unit. Its more expensive than other unit but in my opinion its reliability and sturdy build make it worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for well over a year and I use it everyday. I mix protein powder with my soy milk and let this little machine mix it to put in coffee. It froths milk really well and makes great hot chocolate. I love it! When I first got it - I unpackaged and tried it. It was so quiet that I just knew it would not work and was ready to send it back - lo and behold, it worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: MtnMamma

customer_reviews.title: It's ok not sure it's worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: Really wish they warning plate worked better if it was able to get it hot would be so much better I use this to mix my powder chai tea with water only gets it lukewarm
customer_reviews.author: Buckem

product_meta.title: Capresso froth Pro Milk Frother for Cappuccino, Espresso, Latte and Hot Chocolate, 7" x 5" x 6", Black/Matte Silver
product_meta.description:
CAPRESSO FROTH PRO AUTOMATIC MILK FROTHER
 THICK AND RICH FROTHED MILK
Designed to create thick and rich frothed milk for cappuccinos, steamed milk for cafe lattes, and frothy hot chocolate, the new Capresso froth PRO automatic milk frother produces professional quality results with a quick touch of a button. Three temperature settings - hot, warm and cold, open up a variety of options for delicious beverages with a creative touch. This stand-alone appliance is an ideal complement to any coffee maker, espresso machine or the hot chocolate lover! The unit features a black pitcher along with a black base with stainless steel accents and illuminated touch pad buttons. The smart design includes dual auto shut-off for safety and a storage compartment in the bottom of the base to hold the two frothing discs and one heating disc that come with the unit.

Frothing Made Simple FEATURES AND BENEFITS
 * Unique frothing disk (patent pending) delivers maximum milk froth
 * Dual auto shut-off for safe operation
 * Large Capacity- 8 oz for frothing or 12 oz for heating without frothing
 * Three temperature settings: cold, hot, warm
 * Scratch resistant non-stick milk pitcher with stay cool handle
 * Three illuminated operating buttons
 * Two frothing disks / One heating disk
 * Dishwasher safe removable milk pitcher with see-through lid

Frothing Made Simple
